TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Satili, title = Satili, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Satili} }

S.FORM: Satili o Tadamaanay tamdaw ato cipo'otay o tadamaanay tamdaw ilaloma' no sofitay a tamdaw itini i kasasa'er-no'orip a faco no Indo. Mahaop ko honti a kasasiromaroma a malatapangay no sifo, cisakowanay to polong a 'icel-sakowan 'edeng no kawasan'icel ko awaay. Pinengnengan Kasasa'er no 'orip Polomen Fise Sotolo Tatiri'an a tilid

Satili o Tadamaanay tamdaw ato cipo'otay o tadamaanay tamdaw ilaloma' no sofitay a tamdaw itini i kasasa'er-no'orip a faco no Indo. Mahaop ko honti a kasasiromaroma a malatapangay no sifo, cisakowanay to polong a 'icel-sakowan 'edeng no kawasan'icel ko awaay. Pinengnengan Kasasa'er no 'orip Polomen Fise Sotolo Tatiri'an a tilid
